review: TikTok is a great app overall but I have a few complaints i've posted plenty of videos that I have done nothing but dance or talk to my friends in and while I am making those videos I don't say or do anything but for some reason I post them in TikTok takes it down due to community guidelines that don't make any sense because I don't do anything in them and if I did do something in there I know that some on my other videos have worse things in them that they never take down but for some reason whenever I don't do anything wrong they take it down I am now prevented from posting any TikTok video and they said that if they have to take down one more video my account will be permanently banned I have an account warning for nothing and that's the reason I only rate TikTok two stars I have had another TikTok I had in 2020 and I never got banned or had a account warning from that one I have had this account for two whole years and I'm just now getting an account warning for something that makes no sense my account is on the verge of a getting band and TikTok is really blowing me but other than that I love TikTok A few weeks later I posted a video doing nothing in a store and about to cuss y'all out if you don't leave me alone TikTok leave me alone before I destroy you
title: My review from TikTok

review: I love this app- the videos and trends are interesting. Plus the different ‚Äúsides‚Äù of TikTok make finding ur content niche really fun and easy. However, every update makes the app more and more un-useable to the average person who uses it. It‚Äôs content suppressing features are awful (shadowbanning, banning accounts / removing videos for seemingly no reason) to small accounts. PLUS they remove or make it impossible to find filters once they get popular, and they remove really helpful features all the time. Users used to be able to trim the audios to only use a certain part, but now you can‚Äôt. If an artist posts their song and it‚Äôs one minute long and you want to only use a 5-15 second part of it, well too bad, you can‚Äôt! The only way you can is by posting the audio yourself, so the original person doesn‚Äôt even get credit ://. Also, the newest updates ‚Äúinbox‚Äù section is hard to use and just plain FUGLY. Why would you mix DMS and notifications?? It makes no sense. Also why do posts look like live streams without the caption and everything?? I miss the old app, back when it had a visually appealing look and was actually easy to use. I‚Äôm still gonna use it, but its honestly too much work to post if the app is gonna fight you every step of the way.
title: Every update gets worse

review:
Tiktok keeps systematically taking down peoples accounts for no apparent reason with no explanation and those accounts are disproportionately from people of marginalized groups. While pedophiles, racists, homophobes, etc. get to have massive platforms, there are young black activists getting de-platformed who don‚Äôt even curse much less do anything sinister or worth punishment. There is genuinely no reason for them to be banned yet they are.

On top of this, there are frequent platform-wide glitches where everyone‚Äôs views seem to drop to zero as well as their followers, following, likes, etc. After these glitches people will have followers removed and sometimes the information the algorithm uses for your fyp resets so people are forced to watch videos they don‚Äôt like or care about. Furthermore, the app as a whole is incredibly inaccessible. Video editing features are difficult to use. Sounds may not always work. The auto caption feature (which hasn‚Äôt even finished its roll out yet) isn‚Äôt even accurate and highlights blatant discrimination within the app by censoring words like ‚Äúasian women‚Äù and critiques of white supremacy are consistently bastardized. For example, someone may say ‚Äúwe shouldn‚Äôt use eurocentric teaching in schools‚Äù and the captions will read ‚Äúwe should use afrocentric teaching in schools.‚Äù
title: DISCRIMINATORY

review: i liked this app better when it was musically, i wish it‚Äôd go back to that. now it has gotten to the point where they have changed so much that it is always unfair to a lot of creators. people don‚Äôt get the recognition they deserve by being on the for you page or whatever it may be. videos get taken down too easily same with accounts being banned for literal no reason and when you try to contact tiktok about it, they don‚Äôt care what so ever. they have made a lot of people lose so much on their accounts when they get banned, such as their money they make from the creator fund & their old drafts which could be personal and never could get back if their account is banned for good. tiktok should at least give people their money and their videos in their drafts after they get banned, that‚Äôd be fair. tiktok is homophobic, transphobic, hates all LGBTQ+ even though theres a large community on their do not be fooled, tiktok does not like us nor support us even if we have support on the app. tiktok really needs to change for the better. maybe more bad reviews could help, so if you have any of these same issues and have heard bout these issues with tiktok then please leave a bad review and maybe tiktok will finally listen to us and change for the better. üíìüíìüíì
title: unfair guidelines. homophobic.

review:
okay so i really like tiktok and its very fun to just be a part of the community on there but the report and block system needs to be a bit better. 
example for blocking: theres this person in my life who ABSOLUTELY hates me and will do anything to get me in "trouble" (it never works) and hes made like 7 accounts to stalk me to find anything slightly "bad" ive done and ive blocked him and reported all of his accounts and only one got banned.
solution for my example: maybe make it so if someone is blocking you and youre making accounts, after you make like 2-3 accounts and follow that person that blocked you, it gets "rid" of that acciunt completley for that person's accounts. but this only will work if tiktok knows if youre "dragonmaster1234" (that name was an example) and you make another account 
example for reports: i have this other friend who hates me (people dont like me i know) and she like stole stuff from me and spread fake stuff about me so i reported her and tiktok did nothing.
solution to that example: look further into reports. thats all i have to say.

I like the filters that were added, and I like how drafts save unfinished videos, but nothing else really seems beneficial. Favorites is now the only real way I can save sounds, which can get annoying because it takes too long to scroll through my saved sounds. Privates aren‚Äôt really helpful anymore, they‚Äôre stuck between public videos and you can easily forget they‚Äôre even there. Videos are still able to be featured, but I can‚Äôt ever see featured videos because the featured stream was replaced with the for you stream. My follower stream is never in order and has videos that were posted weeks ago vs videos posted recently. Everyone‚Äôs likes went down significantly once the update took place. Why were BFF‚Äôs taken away? Those helped people reward active followers without having to follow them back. There‚Äôs also a setting that stops you after liking a certain amount of videos and tells you to take a break. No other social media app has this, so the only thing you‚Äôre really doing is making it easier for someone to switch apps or even delete this one. I haven‚Äôt been able to like a video for two hours now, and I‚Äôm really wondering why I even came back to this app.
title: What Happened?

review: I don't post anything ok the app. I follow people and make privates. I have (had) hundreds of privates with memories and just fun-to-do videos made. I updated the app today and my privates have turned into 'drafts' which basically means I can't reuse sounds I have previously used before the recent update. Meaning all of my privates (ranging in at least the hundreds) are simply videos that I can't reuse or even save to my camera roll without posting the video publicly (which I refuse to since they are personal videos not meant for others to see) when trying to solve the problem with my privates the videos I watch to decide if I delete them or not end up being duplicated to the top so now I have twice as many privates. It's a struggle and I'm genuinely hurt because everything I've done on the app for probably 2-3 years have turned into trash. Not sure if this helped but I want things to be put back to normal instead of this garbage.
title: I'm bothered with the May 17 update.

review:
TT is like a woman with PMS, you never know what you are going to get. They are extremely moody and treat people who use the app like people in China. 
2 people can have the EXACT same post. One person get a community violation and the other persons video goes viral. There is no way to contact anyone in support and if you somehow get through no one ever gets back to you. 
Then I used to have this awesome editor. Could add captions, had the ability to set the timing of the text on screen, and the music. One day it all goes away and have an archaic editor. Cannot add captions and no way to add text on screen. When I contacted support I was told the new editor was rolling out in stages. But I already had the new editor, they took it away. 
The fact that there are people that can heat your posts and that there is something other than the algorithm that determines if you do well or not. So if you get on their bad side or get flagged for anything they limit your reach. 
Since I can‚Äôt edit in the app I now use INSTAGRAM which is so much better and just repurpose to TT. If they want you to edit in the TT app they should have a decent editor. You don‚Äôt have to worry about getting on someone‚Äôs bad side and getting your account taken away or your reach limited.
title: Really want to like TT but they make it so hard

review:
What is TikTok?

TikTok is a really enjoyable app to millions of people. It has become one of the most popular apps out there, and more than 2 million videos from users all around the world are uploaded daily. On TikTok you are able to communicate with friends, upload a video of your own, and watch other users videos as well. On TikTok something that is commonly used is known as ‚Äúfilters.‚Äù Filters are some thing you may use to have fun, boost your confidence, or to even just put a smile on your face. Some of the filters have games and some don‚Äôt, you can use whichever you want! If you make a video and you don‚Äôt want anybody to see you can put it as ‚Äúprivate‚Äù and only you are able to see the video. If you made a video and you don‚Äôt want to upload it, but you don‚Äôt want to delete it, you can put it in your ‚Äúdrafts‚Äù it will hold all the videos that you don‚Äôt want to upload. TikTok has lots more things that I would love to share with you, but as of right know that‚Äôs all the important information I have for you today. Bye!
title: TikTok review

review: When I first heard about Tik Tok in the impression that I had on it was about two or three years ago and I felt that it was more of a kid/teenager social app. I kind of kept my distance dude to my ignorance or of how lit the app actually was. And a friend, one day, Was watching a show DIY‚Äôs video and I was being nosy, ends noticed how awesome the video editing and Content was and how it caught my interest and attention the whole way through the video. My friend asked me if I had an account and I told her no and she said ‚Äúaw man, you gotta download it and make an account! Just make sure when you do it that you have a WHOLE DAY free! And I looked at her confused and she said, ‚Äúthat‚Äôs how long you will be on it once you get on the app because it would capture me.‚Äù Lol. And sure enough. You know the rest‚Ä¶. But more then just being sucked into videos, I started making my own content and I found how easy it was to put together an edited video was pretty easy! title: A great stepping stone platform

review:
I like this app when it comes to finding and consuming media, but making content is a PAIN, and my account is so heavily restricted because of my age. 
Sometimes I make videos over one minute WITH AUDIO OVER ONE MINUTE. If I save it to drafts, the audio deletes itself saying ‚ÄúThis audio doesn‚Äôt support videos over one minute long,‚Äù DESPITE THE AUDIO BEING OVER A MINUTE LONG. Filming videos with multiple clips is torture so I have to use a different app to edit. 
I love cosplaying but have a hard time making friends, but theoretically with TikTok I can make friends around my age who like cosplay as well. But my account has limited reach because of my age, other people can‚Äôt duet/stitch my videos, my videos only reach like 5 people, and I can‚Äôt DM my friends. It‚Äôs so frustrating how I put lots of effort into my cosplays and barely anyone sees them. It‚Äôs frustrating how I can‚Äôt talk to my friends on this app even though there‚Äôs plenty of other apps that allows people YOUNGER than me to DM people. 
I just want to show people my silly costumes, talk to my silly moots, and be myself on this app, but I can‚Äôt do that because of the restrictions put on my account. Editing on this app is painful, and putting so much effort on a video only for that effort to go to waste is pain. I hate this.
title: I‚Äôm so frustrated with this app

review: Whoever is in charge of moderating the content is not consistent across the board. A company should train all employees to follow the exact same guidelines for all creators. One video along with hundreds of ‚Äúduets‚Äù and ‚Äústitches‚Äù can exist but I can upload the EXACT same thing (duet/stitch) and get flagged. Lately I‚Äôve even had videos flagged with no option for an appeal. Not even a specific reason is given for the video being flagged. Just ‚Äúviolates standards‚Äù and nothing further. The bullying by kids and adults alike is concerning. People leave awful things in the comments and reporting them comes back saying they didn‚Äôt violate standards.  We can‚Äôt video reply to defend ourselves without being flagged for bullying.  Meanwhile you have big creators getting verified whose content is based solely on insulting and doxxing other creators. True crime creators give graphic details of crimes yet people can‚Äôt talk about their personal trauma without being silenced. They cherry pick who gets ‚Äúpunished‚Äù and Who doesn‚Äôt. The larger creators can post whatever they want with no repercussions and get paid for it. You can‚Äôt even get a nonstandard reply from the support team when entering a ticket. It‚Äôs just a generic response that doesn‚Äôt even fit the topic.  It‚Äôs unfortunate because the app itself is great.
title: Discriminatory

review: Honestly no other app can compare to tik tok. It‚Äôs by far my favorite app and i use it constantly, although maybe too much but i see that as not a negative. It‚Äôs the only app that really promotes such a wide array of content and really tailors content to you. The only drawback I would say is the fact that sometimes it is really hard to have your content put out to other people, as the algorithm seems to be spotty in its ability to recognize content and promote it to a wider audience. This leads to many videos not reaching the amount of people you had hoped for and there is no real way to get it promoted. But this issue is not a big one, as from time to time my content seems to reach a wider audience, and so is the nature of life, you win some you loose some. This app has really benefited so many people as I can see, ranging from influencers to small businesses, and lets people reach a wide audience that many other social media apps do not. Tik tok is the first of its kind in this sort of viral media, and it is truly something special and worthwhile downloading. I would choose no other app over it.
title: favorite app

review: Tiktok used to be a very amusing app to me. I would enjoy spending my time following my other friends, making videos, and viewing other peoples videos. The thing that really ruined my view about tiktok is when they banned my account. I was absolutely disappointed, for a fact that I did nothing to get banned, also that the app didn‚Äôt alert me what I had done to get banned. I‚Äôm not the type to comment rude comments on other pages nor have I ever done that. I just got banned today, so in fact I‚Äôm guessing it‚Äôs something I did recently but I still have no clue. I have gotten one warning on tiktok which was for my profile picture, but I immediately removed my profile picture. I thought you would at least get 2 warnings before getting banned, however i got only one. In conclusion, i don‚Äôt have any clue of what i have done to get banned on tiktok and I am extremely disappointed in this app. After all the disrespectful, racist, homophobic, fat phobic, transphobic etc. comments I‚Äôve seen people comment on this app, and I have choose to ignore those comments and be the better person, their account never got banned. Tiktok at least tell me what I got banned for and maybe that will uplift my thoughts on this app, but for now I am just so tired of this app.
title: I am very disappointed with tiktok.

review: This app used to be one of my favorites, it was a great, entertaining source of funny videos and more, I loved it until I started getting harassed by other people due to comments I put that weren‚Äôt even that bad. I was a comic book content creator and on some on my videos I was called a ‚ÄúStupid kid‚Äù people having problems with me for no reasons at all. This caused me to delete the app, while I have some good memories of this app, I have flashbacks and memories about what those people said and now I cannot forget, it‚Äôs ruining me. For the people that this is happening to, delete the app immediately because once someone starts harassing you it‚Äôs almost impossible to forget well, for me anyway. I can‚Äôt even read a comic or look some of my favorite things in the world, DC and marvel, I can‚Äôt even look at a character without having some horrid memories of what they said. Long story short, I used to love the app but now. It tore me apart and took some of the best parts of me. I‚Äôve also had to push myself away from comics for a while. Due to this. And not to mention, I have been reading comics for 19 years and people said I‚Äôve never read one due to having a different opinion. Also even ridiculed for liking marvel and dc equally.

title: Amazing app! Love it! But a problem/error- :(

review:
Lately, with the new community guidelines, I have been having some trouble. A lot of the videos I have been posting are getting taken down. There is no gore, no violence, and nothing that could possibly violate guidelines besides a fake wine glass. I am a minor and cannot drink wine, so for a necessary prop to the cosplay (The version of Aziraphale in the reverse Omens au) I used water with red dye in it with a wine glass. I even put disclaimers in the caption that it‚Äôs dyed water and not real, but it still gets taken down. I explained all of this in my appeal, but they denied it. I was extremely lucky to have thought of screen recording all the drafts I had taken as him, because once a video gets taken down, there‚Äôs no saving it to your camera roll. In the next update, it would be nice if we could save videos that have gotten deleted. A lot of them are harmless and cosplayers who worked extremely hard on that content, just for it to go to waste (with no way of getting it back to save it for themselves). Tiktok used to be my favorite app, but the severe decline in posting rights is disappointing. 
Sincerely,
     A concerned cosplayer (who is above the age of 14 and not drinking wine)
title: Cosplayer problems

review:

title: Love this app but I have some suggestions

review: I recently downloaded app cause my Niece is on it and asked me to join. I liked it at first, lots of vids of kids, some adults sharing their pets doing cute things!  After a few weeks the majority of posts highlighted to me were bout animals, but alot of kids were mistreating the animals, not in a horrible way but not as they should be either! Some kids were holding their dogs muzzles in their fist and squeezing, another was doing this as well but then she was digging her nail in its upper mouth while squeezing her hand around its mouth,  some were covering their dogs heads and eyes for long periods of times and others were showing their pets trying to bite them (obviously out of some kind of fear) etc etc. I could go on and on but the people running this app needs to have better grip on how kids promote their pets, cause how they are doing it now is not eight! Kids should not be able to have fun through the mistreatment of their pets!  I think cause the pets not being physically harmed its allowed to be posted but these dogs are being abused! Its not right and its not fair to pets or the parents of pets that dont know what their kids are doing for attention. Its a disgrace and only promotes the mistreatment of animals! I deleted this app but wont let the voice of those animals go unheard!
title: Needs to get a grip over the treatment of how kids promote their pets

review:
Love this app, been using it for almost a year now. I just wish that bullies would be taken more seriously on this app. I‚Äôve reported a few comments not just on my own videos but on others as well that are flat out rude and could seriously cause someone in the wrong mind set to hurt themselves. Only to turn around and have nothing be done about the comments or the person posting them. Also I‚Äôve noticed ALOT of children who are way under the suggested age on this app. I think security for this app needs to be upped and made sure that these young kids aren‚Äôt on here. There‚Äôs a lot of mature adult content that other creatures are posting and kids shouldn‚Äôt be seeing or hearing some of these audios. My final thought on this app is that the creators need to fix the comments!! Instead of just mixing all the comments up on videos, should have an algorithm like Facebook has where the comments are in order! Tired of having to dig through hundreds of comments to see what one person recently posted on my videos, only to not be able to find it or it‚Äôs at the very bottom or mixed in the middle. 
Over all easy to use app, lots of amazing creators, cosplayers and people that I have come across on this app.
title: Love this app

review: I absolutely love TikTok, this app has helped me laugh, learn, and so much more, however I do have an issue with the new privacy standards. TikTok randomly asked me for me to clarify my age, which I didn‚Äôt mind doing because I had previously done it. But after I did lots of things on my account changed. My account was getting some fame and I was gaining followers and even managed to get around 15k followers. However once I clarified my age (which I put my real age) nobody could comment, stitch, save, or duet my videos. And with the account I had those things were very important. TikTok has made it almost impossible to make any progression with my account and has given me zero motivation to keep posting. I just wish they would change the privacy settings back to the way they used to be. I understand that they want to make sure kids don‚Äôt do stupid things and are protected, however I don‚Äôt think this was the right way to do it. I should be able to put my privacy settings the way I want for my own safety and not have the app tell me what me and my followers can and cannot do. I will change the rating to five stars if this issue is resolved.

review: I have resorted to leaving this review since I was not able to report these problems to tiktok on the app or through the help center. Listen I love tiktok, but just bring back the regular being able to pause slideshows, not going back and forth between the weird screen format change and muting the audio. It is not just me who shares this sentiment. I have seen many, many people complain about it and talk about how they just want the regular pausing feature permanently like I do. There is NO ONE who has said that they like or prefer the newer slideshow function better than the original. If it‚Äôs so necessary for tiktok to have this ugly newer slideshow function applied to users then at least give tiktok users the option to switch between the two slideshow features. ALSO, please bring back the friends tab, I am not saying to delete the discover page since there are people who like that but please add the friends page back somehow, I would like to be able to see my mutuals videos and stories and not have them be buried in my following page and filtered out by the stupid algorithm. There are plenty of other things to address here but I‚Äôm going to leave it at that.
title: Slideshow Updates and other Features

title: Very fun and interesting but WAYY TO MUCH TOXIC PEOPLE

review: The common idea is that TikTok is for kids. I am here to tell you that is 100% not true. There is a HUGE community of Adults on TikTok, and we are all able to have FUN and express ourselves in a way that can be silly, serious, goofy, or ANYWAY that you want. There is the "for you" page that allows you to browse through various broadcasters. To build the type of content you would like to continue seeing, you simply press the heart icon on the right hand side of the page. After a while TikTok will only show you the type of content that interests you based on your previous likes.  If you want to continue to see content from a particular person, simply press the plus sign on the right side of the page. This user will now show up on your "following" page ( located on the top left of your TikTok main page). This application can be VERY therapeutic for those of you that would like to create content. It allows you to express yourself in anyway that you want. I recommend this app 100% for boomers, Gen-X, Millennials, and ANYONE else who feels they might be too old for this app!!!
title: Review for Adults

title: Absolutely absurd

review: It seems this app definitely only likes accounts with a significant amount of followers. So many accounts with highly inappropriate content..remain online with an ungodly amount of views and comments simply because they have a high follower count. My teen daughter‚Äôs account was recently ‚Äúpermanently banned for multiple violations of community guidelines.‚Äù She only ever got one warning and video deleted (it wasn‚Äôt even an original video..it was a viral tik tok video she did..which constitutes about 97% of all tik tok videos). The original and recreated videos still exist and accounts are still open. No other warnings or anything else. She loved tik tok and spent time learning dances and recreating others videos, as is the point of the platform. But she didn‚Äôt have a high follower account. I searched and searched for who to email and ask for reason/proof behind the permanent ban. There is ZERO way to contact anyone. My daughter loved the creative platform but was shut out for zero reason. I personally monitored her posts. There was zero reason for the permanent ban other than her account not being popular. Way to to Tik Tok. As if teens don‚Äôt have enough reason to feel bullied and insignificant..you punish those who aren‚Äôt ‚Äúpopular‚Äù and delete the videos they spent time and effort to create and post. It‚Äôs disgusting.

review: I‚Äôve never been into social media, never was a fan of FB, Instagram is ok for certain things but again, never excited me, nor did Twitter, Snapchat or Pinterest, etc, but when TikTok came out, I was quickly swept away! I love that TikTok has a platform for everything. You want to know what the best vacuum to buy at a specific price point, TikTok will have a ton of creators that give you a quick rundown on which one they love and why along with a demo of course. Want to learn how to shuffle dance? There are thousands of tutorials to pick from. Want to connect with those on a spiritual journey or learn how to plan a destination wedding? You got it, TikTok will have it! What I love even more is that as TikTok begins to notice my watching preferences, it will select videos based on what I‚Äôve watched and put them in my feed and they do a great job of getting it right! Now if I could just get that guy to stop popping up to tell me I need to stop scrolling and get off TikTok for a bit.. üòÇ I‚Äôm told I‚Äôm too old for TikTok, I think my generation is going to take it over. üòò

title: good app but with problems

review: I personally dont think tiktok is a great app. The only reason it says ‚Äúrecently downloaded‚Äù on my side is because my friend forgot his phone and needed to use mine. But while he was scrolling, i could see him just disassociate with the world and it was honestly quite heartbreaking. As someone who used to watch a form of tiktoks I can say that this app is EXTREMELY addicting, and ruins mental health. My friend had serious mental health issues while owning the app, but once he deleted it he said he never felt so free. Dont get me wrong the app has sort of tried to work on this problem with its ‚Äúone hour limit‚Äù meaning if you spend 1 hour on the app it makes it so you have to put in a passcode to continue using the app. And yes it was very smart of Tiktok on the children side of things, but on the adult and teenager side it doesnt look so great.  I was reading some of these reviews for fun and it was very upsetting.  Many people have complained that they have spent 13 or even more hours a day on this app.  People could be using this time to socialize, sleep, eat etc. but instead use it for rubbing a piece of plastic FOR HOURS.  I would really love it if TikTok would add a limit where it would just kick you out of the app after a certain amount of time.  Thank you for reading, -Pebble

review: Tiktok is an amazing app that allows you to make short videos of anything you want. There are dances you can learn, tutorials on things like led light colors, cleaning things out of carpetsüíÄüíÄ and many more! There are so many sides of tiktok too! For example, there is straight tiktok. This is where all of the dancing, slime, povs, and main stuff happens. Alt tiktok is where you get a mix of deep/creepy/funny videos and straight tiktok videos. Deep tiktok is the deepest side of tiktok that is very hard to get to. This is where all of the dark memes and vibes happen. I am on deep tiktok because there is absolutely no drama, no political comments, and all in all it‚Äôs a straight up vibe. There is theatre tiktok, Barbie tiktok, broccoli tiktok, and so many other sides. It‚Äôs actually insane how many sides of tiktok I have been on! You can add videos to favorites, hold down on the video and select not interested if you don‚Äôt like a video, and there are settings to manage your account. review: I swear if the government BANS this amazing app I will lose my mind. TikTok is the only thing that has gotten me through quarantine. Yes, we might be banning it for a serious reason, but I think it‚Äôs a bunch of hogwash. It keeps me happy and smiling. It‚Äôs a great way to interact with people as well. I downloaded this app on December 31st, 2018 and it was one of the best decisions I have ever made. It‚Äôs one of the only places I can be myself. review: On a scale of 1-5, I would rate this app a 3. I think it‚Äôs a different and creative form of expression for young people. However, it has or can potentially dangerous for youth. The content in most songs is 18+. In my experience, I‚Äôve had to tell youth in 6th grade classes to shut it off because of the explicit content. The app has graphic content. Users can search for people that‚Äôs near the. This can pose a danger for young children who may think someone is a trying to be their friend on the app, but it could be a predator. And they can message back and forth. There is a potential for bullying in the comments when people upload their videos. And it just doesn‚Äôt seem secure for teen. It would be hard for a parent to monitor because fake accounts can be created. Anymore can message you and follow you on the app as well. So, there are many young people on the app who are posting videos of themselves belly dancing and gyrating and they have thousands of followers and people in the comments saying inappropriate things. Other than the potentials for danger and predatory behavior, I feel that the app is appropriate for adolescents who are trying to find themselves and explore their many gifts and talents.

Also, when using voiceover, it brings me right back to the top of the page even though I've been swiping to try to get to the next video. also, could you see if you could possibly improve the accessibility of the editing and creating video controls so that those who are blind and visually impaired can make the videos and add sounds and all the other stuff that you guys have available. Those are just to name a few. If you could please look into the issues and fix them for people who have voiceover, that would be very much appreciated and it will definitely help. I am pretty sure that I am not the only blind and visually impaired person who has talked about the accessibility of this app. And I'm sure I'm not the only one who has reviewed and talked about the accessibility in the review. I just hope that you guys will take into consideration what I am sure other people have said. Thank you so much

title: Really TikTok? Just really??

review:
Before you get this app, just know this precaution. I one hundred percent believe that Tiktok can be used as an outlet and a source of happiness for so many creators. But, for me, it has turned into something much darker. 
     I began spending maybe thirty minutes per day on this app at the start of this year, when I downloaded it for the first time. But slowly, as we trudged into quarantine, it began swallowing four, five and even a possible six hours of my day. It has caused me to avoid going outside, to avoid making interactions, and recently avoid doing important schoolwork, which is causing my grades to decline faster than I need them to. All I want people reading this to know is this app can be extremely addicting, so set limits for utilizing Tiktok. Make sure you don‚Äôt waste the sunlight watching other people live their dreams. Make your own dreams. 
     As a rehabilitation from this app, I decided to delete it once and for all and see how much better my life is without it. I know for many people it doesn't get this bad, especially adults, but STOP and assess how much time you could be wasting on social media. If you have read until here, this means something. It means that you are more than a watcher of a screen. Have a great day! Thank you for your consideration! :)

Do you see the thing is if you approach a TikTok with a positive mindset and life in general with a positive mindset, then tick-tock will reward you with positive videos, but whatever you do in your real life is going to be reinforced by TikTok because of its real AI and sensory algorithms that take into account your voice tone of voice where you are location. What‚Äôs your camera sees. All I know is an engineer I think TikTok is a great opportunity for people to really get to know them selves, and if you‚Äôre smart, what you understand is that you can elevate through social media, by simply elevating your life, and then the people and the things that you have access to the social media will also improve just trying to put you on.

title: great but needs some more

review:
Yes we all now realize social media is a societal poison that will doom us all; so may TikTok be the last of its kind. To quote, a TikTok no less: while Facebook has taught you to hate the people you know above all else- reasonably so- because they‚Äôre genuinely terrible people connected to you by some arbitrary what have you; TikTok shows you how to learn to love complete strangers.
All over the world you get to see people who laugh, smile, create, think and teach in a multitude of ways. This whole dang world is filled with strangers, beautiful, interesting, brilliant strangers. Cooking cakes of old, teaching us redacted missteps in American history, and bringing that much needed Vine hilarity back into the world. As we all collectively realize we all just have to put our phones down, take a walk and let capitalism implode on itself; TikTok is the perfect soothsayer to help us unwind before the Red Dawn; the moment we will all have to accept we need strangers, we need people all over the world and those people deserve dignity and comfort just as much as we do.

I did not understand this, so I decided to create a new account which included motivation and good vibes to help everyone mentally and emotionally. I had gained a few followers, but then.. the same thing had happened, TikTok logged me out and removed my account. At this point, I was a bit more upset, but still decided to make a third account that included relatable day to day things that most people deal with... the third account had boosted to over 3k followers, after that, I had issues uploading my videos, so I asked TikTok why I had issues with uploads.. and instead of fixing the issue, they fully logged me out and removed my third account. I'm completely done with this app until they can refrain from singling creators just so they can use taken away accounts as a user base number. I'm done providing accounts for them just so they can take it away from me.

review:
Problem one, 
My younger sister had an account that was deleted recently. I know for a fact, because I keep tabs on her content, that she didn‚Äôt break the rules that you barely enforce. She‚Äôs enjoying herself and you deleted her page without telling her and for no reason. Absolutely not cool. It isn‚Äôt just her, you‚Äôve done this with other pages that have done nothing to break the rules. This needs to be changed or you‚Äôll lose the people making you money. 
Problem two,
I‚Äôve complained about this before and yet nothing has been done to change it. Shadow banning my videos. This is a shady version of censorship Tik Tok does that is irritating and disgraceful. Incase you don‚Äôt know this is happening, unlikely, I‚Äôll define it. Shadowbanning is when TikTok blocks a video on your page but doesn‚Äôt tell you it‚Äôs been blocked. So, your fans don‚Äôt see the video but you do. It‚Äôs so irritating. This should never be a form of censorship on any platform, including one with rising popularity. I‚Äôve uploaded so many harmless dancing videos and cosplay videos that have been shadowbanned for no reason. And then when I upload a video redirecting my fans to a different platform to see the videos, that video is banned as well. This is not ok. This needs to be fixed. Thank you for your time.

title: TikTok fix this please

review:
Tik Tok is a brilliant idea and a great way to bring people together and allow others to discover new interests and gain information things easily. However, it is far too easy to be addicted to simply scrolling and scrolling. You can sit down, thinking you‚Äôll just watched a couple videos, and end up spending an hour looking at something you won‚Äôt even remember when you wake up tomorrow. Also, the thirst for likes and followers doesn‚Äôt stop once it starts. Once people begin to get minimal attention, they will keep doing whatever the newest trends are, no matter how outrageous, in order to get ‚Äúsatisfaction‚Äù from likes. And, the moderation and guidelines are extremely horrible. People have been banned/had their content removed for extremely stupid reasons, while half-naked people are all over, getting hundreds of thousands of likes and followers. To me, this is an extremely large problem, since the majority of the audience watching Tik Tok are minors, under the age of 16, that absolutely do not need to be exposed to such explicit content as such a young age.

Overall, the concept is very smart and well reasoned, but the execution has created an addicting, inappropriate app for young children.

title: Leave Tiktok alone

review: This app wastes your time like nothing else and reprograms your brain to have a short attention span due to its quick gratification time in the form of short videos. The app is also owned by a Chinese company that has little to no respect for your online privacy, and also censors freedom of speech, especially content criticizing the totalitarian Chinese government and its abuse and total disregard of the human rights of its citizens. A fair amount of users also post content that is misleading or outright false, especially when it comes to political matters. This is all on top of the relatively obnoxious and sometimes outright dangerous trends that are started on this app. Some users post entertaining, original, and witty content, but a fair amount also post obnoxious, dangerous, lewd, or otherwise inappropriate content. Yes, this is technically their right to free speech and expressing themselves, but you should ask yourself how much you personally are willing to expose yourself to. Also, if you are a parent, carefully consider what you are willing to expose your children to. Also, I am not a boomer, I‚Äôm well within the target demographic of this app and regrettably have also used it and given it a fair shake. In conclusion, don‚Äôt get this app, you‚Äôll save yourself a lot of time that you wouldn‚Äôt be able to get back.
title: Don‚Äôt get this app

review: Ok so TikTok is cool and stuff but it has its problems. So first is reporting. When someone reports something, there is a part where you say what is in the video that‚Äôs bad. review: TikTok came into my life at a moment when my life was questionable.  Newly diagnosed with triple negative ductal breast carcinoma, spinning out of my own mind, questioning all of my life and it‚Äôs outcome, what I would leave behind, who I would leave behind, living on borrowed time so to speak and worried about how everyone else‚Äôs life would turn out if I weren‚Äôt here.  I cried for days.  Sometimes while crying I would open the TikTok app and cry while watching and then some stupid, random video would cross the screen and my sad tears suddenly turned to happy joyful tears üò≠ü§£üòÇ the cluster of videos and random things in life are amazing, the people in the world who you never thought would help you through the most trying times of life, not know what your going through, still exist in the world today and TikTok was a connection to that world.  I will forever be grateful for the people who helped change my thought process from I have cancer to cancer doesn‚Äôt have me! It will be heart wrenching if this app was banned.
title: Of perfect timing.

review: I honestly love scrolling through TikTok when I have nothing to do but my main complaint is when TikTok tries out a new update that actually benefits the experience and then changes it. I‚Äôm referring to the new clear like, comment, save, and share buttons. I loved the buttons being smaller and clear as it added to the experience of watching a video. When they are smaller it lets me see the video easier without being forced to clear mode. I like the option of clear mode when I‚Äôm watching long videos and want to see the whole thing but when it‚Äôs 15s to 1:30 mins I just want the small icons. With the recent update the old (larger, and fully white) icons returned and it‚Äôs extremely distracting to the videos. I already engage by liking, commenting, saving, and sharing. Those things are second nature to me but I don‚Äôt need big white distracting icons to draw my attention away from the video to go scroll through comments or share when I‚Äôll do that anyways!
title: Love it, but please commit to updates

review: TikTok offers a variety of content that is fun, creative, and even enlightening. I‚Äôve really enjoyed it from both the viewer side and creator side. It gives me a chance to hear authentic voices of people from all walks of life and helps me broaden my perspective. TikTok also allows me to explore my creative side as a content creator. The only downside (and it‚Äôs a huge one) is the community violations process. TikTok really, really, really needs to improve upon this issue. Several times a day I see where creators get violations or banned simply because someone else doesn‚Äôt like what they said. Some content that expresses a mere opinion gets flagged while others that are easily violating community standards (sometimes with serious consequences)are left untouched even though it was reported repeatedly by several people. If there is ever a reason I would want to leave TikTok, it would be this. And despite TikTok‚Äôs enormous appeal and benefits, I do seriously consider leaving it because of this on a daily basis.
title: Great Platform but with One Huge Drawback

Including the duet feature which blew up a ton gave the opportunity for people to interact or react with the TikTok video they were dueting. I have known about TikTok even before it blew up and downloaded it when it did. I had this app ever since and the possibility of it being taken down in the United States worries me. This app is my to-go app for entertainment and it has made me go through so many emotions throughout the years. review: First of all, this app is super fun! I have a public account with about 35 fans, but there are many issues and glitches in the way the app works. My first issue is that there is a certain algorithm to the report system, so if people who don‚Äôt like a person go through and report that person‚Äôs videos, they get taken down almost automatically. Which is unfair to the creator, when the person could have just used the ‚ÄòNot Interested‚Äô button. A suggestion on how to make this better is that you could make it so that the ‚ÄòNot Interested‚Äô button is more visible, or that when someone reports a video, the staff at TikTok have to watch it and make sure it‚Äôs ok. Another issue is that you have to have 1000 fans to go live, and that lives can easily be shadow banned for no reason, causing it to be extremely difficult to interact with their fans. An example of how to fix this would be to make the shadow-banning shorter, and have a moderator on the live at all times.  Thanks for reading! TikTok is a great app, and these were just a few suggestions to make it better. üòÅ

review: I‚Äôll admit, I only downloaded Tik Tok because the kids I nannied over Covid times convinced me to do it to share my recipes with others. I have learned SO MUCH on this app. For free! The booktok following showed me some amazing books that sparked my love for reading again. The love for reading that I can share with my students. Which brings me to the next thing I found & am thankful for.. teacher TikTok. College taught me a lot, teacher TikTok opened my eyes. I have found so many hands on, engaging lessons on teacher TikTok. My 2nd grade class has enjoyed all of the things I‚Äôve found (including a science experiment involving a marshmallow and toothpick). Now, I‚Äôm trying to get my 60yr+ parents on the app. My mom is learning how to knit and I told her she could find tutorial videos easy on knitting TikTok! My dad loves birds and life hacks. Moral of the story? TikTok has a place for everyone. Unlike meta apps, it cares about its users. Search ‚ÄúI want to die‚Äù and it brings up resources for help on TikTok. Do the same on FB? Pick out your gravestone here! ü•¥

title: DaBaby

review: There are so many things I love about TikTok. This app brings people together! People I would never meet or know in my lifetime are here on TikTok. I have friends from all over the world now! I get to see their landscape, their culture and also how much we are alike! TikTok is educational! It teaches so many different things...science, art, history, life hacks, recipes...you name it...it‚Äôs there with a swipe of the finger. It‚Äôs a wealth of information! TikTok is also humbling. I have experienced the tragedies and the hopelessness of others and realize that we all are the same! It‚Äôs a place where I can lift people up or be carried myself! And most importantly it‚Äôs fun! It brings families and friends together! It‚Äôs a creative outlet like no other! Some of the best talent I‚Äôve seen is here on TikTok. This app gives people the opportunity to showcase all that they are! The exposure alone is invaluable! So when someone asks me about TikTok I tell them all of this...and of course they sign right up! Thank you for creating a wonderful app! I am so very grateful!
title: TikTok

review:
Sure, it‚Äôs amazing to see so many amazing people doing amazing things. I‚Äôve learned so much from different cultures and people, but this app actively tries to silence anyone that‚Äôs not yt passing, or isn‚Äôt trying to ‚Äúhave fun‚Äù or create content just for other people to copy and steal. It‚Äôs absolutely horrific. 

But my BIGGEST complaint is that after I got about 4000+ followers and started actually trying to enjoy the parts of going live, I somehow and suddenly got slapped with a ‚Äúyou‚Äôre not old enough‚Äù!!? I‚Äôm 31 years old!!! How am I not old enough?! I asked support and their first response was that when I signed up, I put in an age ‚Äúbetween 8 and 17‚Äù. I‚Äôve had the app since 2018, I KNOW for a fact I didn‚Äôt put in the wrong age. I sent support a picture of my driver‚Äôs license to show them that I‚Äôm of age and they have since asked me to contact support another way and now I haven‚Äôt had ANY communication since. And I‚Äôm still getting ‚Äúage restriction‚Äù on videos my friends send me. I still can go live with my peers because of this. I‚Äôm so angry, because I have a lot of content and followers, so I don‚Äôt want to just start all over. It‚Äôs all so frustrating. 

Not to mention it happened AFTER I started speaking out and for BIPOC issues. Go. Figure.

title: It‚Äôs great! But there is a problem

review: TikTok is yet another popular social media platform with horrible/nonexistent real customer service that actively allows racist, homophobic, etc. content to stay up while constantly banning content and accounts from creators who are clearly doing nothing wrong.  I have reported clear racism and bullying, and they claim it doesn't "go against community standards", but I know several people trying to bring awareness to important issues or simply trying to make a living from their craft having their accoonts taken from them.  Accounts take a lot of work to build, and to just rip them from valid creators while bullies roam free?  Not to mention the money making programs for creators are a joke.  You can't see your analytics until you have at least 100 followers, can't go live until you hit 1,000 followers, and there are even worse limits before you can even think about becoming a paid creator.  Getting to this point isn't fair, it's all luck and badly created algorithms so that only a select few succeed/win the lottery.  All artists should be able to make good money from the moment they open an account.  Do better, TikTok.  You have the ability, we know you do.  Stop being lazy and do better.

title: I got randomly banned

review:
This app is great and has helped me learn, laugh, think, and share my moments with friends. but WHY ARE THE FEATURES SO INCONSISTENT??? TikTok gives random features to random users and those random users show it off and all the other users get mad at TikTok about it. And the features don‚Äôt even come with app updates, they just randomly appear out of nowhere. At first, it was the test to speech, the auto generated captions and 3 Minute videos, now those features have been given to everyone. But what about the 5 minutes videos that some users can upload, and having a makeup option that lets you customize your makeup on camera, or the ability to sort your favorite videos into collections. I had the last one, but when I uninstalled the app and reinstalled, IT GOT REMOVED!!!
Of course this might be because TikTok wants to test the features before rolling them out to everyone, but TikTok has a beta application that you can join for free. So why not put those features there. And how about actually telling us what‚Äôs new when we update the app instead of just saying, ‚Äútry our latest and greatest effects‚Äù

review:
TikTok is an absolute gem in the world of social media and entertainment. It deserves a solid five-star rating for its endless stream of creativity and fun. The app‚Äôs algorithm seems to have a mind of its own, serving up the most engaging and entertaining content tailored to my interests. Creating and sharing videos has never been easier, thanks to the user-friendly interface and a plethora of editing tools. It‚Äôs so easy to use!

What truly sets TikTok apart is its diverse and inclusive community. I‚Äôve discovered talent and stories from all corners of the globe, expanding my horizons in the most amazing way. The quick, bite-sized format keeps me hooked, and I often find myself saying, ‚ÄúJust one more video!‚Äù as the hours fly by.

Despite the occasional ad (and sometimes I can‚Äôt tell the ads apart from other vids), the sheer enjoyment I get from TikTok overshadows any minor inconveniences. It‚Äôs become a daily dose of joy, and I can‚Äôt imagine my online life without it. Five stars for TikTok - it‚Äôs the ultimate entertainment extravaganza!

review:
TikTok is not just a platform for entertainment, but a community that has allowed me to learn, grow, and connect with people from all walks of life. Through TikTok, I've discovered new hobbies, found inspiring artists, and even met some incredible friends who share my interests and passions.

But what's even more powerful about TikTok is how it brings people together to fight for what's right. Whether it's educating ourselves on social issues, standing up to injustice, or celebrating diversity, TikTok has become a platform for change. I've seen firsthand how this app can unite people across the globe to fight for their rights and freedoms.

So, it's disheartening to hear about efforts to ban TikTok, driven by greed, fear, and power. But I believe in the power of this app and its ability to bring humanity together. Let's not let anything get in the way of that. Let's keep creating, sharing, and fighting for what we believe in. TikTok can and will make a difference in the world, and I'm proud to be a part of it

title: Issues with my account.

review: TikTok is a great app that allows people to make short, fun videos and a chance to go viral. But, there should be a few changes. For one, there should be a filter in the comments that doesn‚Äôt allow nasty comments. In addition, there should be some separation in the videos that you‚Äôve previously liked. For example, there could be sections within the Liked Videos section, including To be Shared, and a separation between recently liked videos and videos that you liked a long time ago. You should also be able to filter   through your liked videos by searching the creator, the sound, or the description/ hashtags. Finally, in addition to the For You section and the Following section, there should be a (Fill in) Genre section. For example, if you are looking for videos specifically on baking, you could be able to choose a genre from a slide down menu and see videos on that topic. So, although TikTok is a great app, there should be a few more features on the next update.
title: Great app, but some adjustments wouldn‚Äôt hurt...

title: things need to change

review: I want to start by saying, when I got this app, I liked it. The videos made me laugh, and there were some incredible and really talented people on the app. But eventually, I started seeing videos that I didn‚Äôt want to see. Some were inappropriate, others were just mean. Those videos did not ‚Äúmake my day‚Äù they ruined it! I wish you were able to control the videos that show up in your feed on this app. The only other thing I have to complain about is that I signed up when I was 13, but, even though this is a 12+ app, when I got my new account, it was basically... idk... the kind that young kids would have. What I mean is, while on a normal tiktok account, you could post videos, edit your profile, etc. but on the account I was given, after I entered in my birthday, you couldn‚Äôt post a video, or use the search feature. And your profile picture was this stupid panda that you couldn‚Äôt change. So I had to delete that account and change my birthday so that I could actually do stuff. I guess that ‚Äúchild‚Äù account would be good for people under 10 but this app is 12+ and I was 13. Aside from the issues, this is a fun app.
title: Fun app but...

review: TikTok is by far my favourite platform and the one I use the most but there are some issues the creators of this app need to address. First of all, TikTok has shown a pattern of silencing and shadowbanning LGBT and POC users while continuing to promote straight, white people who literally just stand there and act sexually. It‚Äôs completely unfair to people who try hard to put out entertaining and original content. My second point is that there needs to be a better way to separate people by age, I know some kids will lie about their age but I feel there should be some sort of system to help block children from finding the explicit content that will sometimes appear on this app. Lastly, I believe this app would be more interesting and appealing if there were some cool personalisation features. Maybe being able to customise a theme for your page or change the colour of the buttons on the app. Definitely not as serious as my other points but still something I‚Äôd love to see. Aside from the few negatives I listed and some that I probably don‚Äôt know about, I love this app a lot. It‚Äôs an easy and simple way to show creativity and inspire others.
title: I Have A Few Criticisms

title: If you are a parent please read..üòî

review:
Where do I start? From evidence showing that TikTok execs purposefully choose videos of people with European features and who are not ‚Äòfat‚Äô, to allowing intolerant videos that are racist, sexist, homophobic, anti-LGBT, etc. to stay up while banning accounts or deleting videos of people who respond to these and air their grievances about these ignorant videos. Now, with the recent murder of George Floyd, TikTok has seemingly deleted all videos that are under the hashtags: ‚Äògeorgefloyd‚Äô ‚Äòjusticeforgeorgefloyd‚Äô and ‚Äòblacklivesmatter‚Äô. Not only that, but they have shadowbanned NUMEROUS Black TikTok users because of their activism. 

It saddens me that some Black people still use TikTok, but I know they use it as a platform to spread acceptance and to uplift the Black LGBT+ community, as well as the Black community overall. TikTok, your platform is huge. It is everywhere. Thousands of videos are shared from your platform every single day. You need to better as a platform, or else the entirety of the Black users on TikTok will stop using your app, and then you will see how great Black TikTokers and Black influencers are. I guarantee that the number of hits your platform receives each day will astronomically decrease. 

Do better by the group that has brought you all so many clicks and hits and brought many users to your app.

The ‚Äútapping too fast‚Äù feature is useless because people will just go onto another social media. In conclusion, Tiktok has many flaws concerning email changes, minor protection and their like feature but otherwise it is my go to social media for being bored and constantly scrolling.

review: I was a fast and growing creator. Over 400K followers, with multi-million viewed videos. I used to get tons of engagement, views averaging 30-60K per video. Now my channel barely gets 1% of the average views and my content is better than it ever has been. I recently got 20 million views on a video.. ON INSTAGRAM! The same video posted to Tiktok, formatted exclusively for TikTok, only got 8k‚Ä¶ this is a struggle, and depressing that NONE of the analytics or tools provided for content creators actually help content creators. No matter how engaging or consistent my content is, the results are always trash. Extremely upsetting and bewildered that this has affected many talented creators like myself but not others. It is very clear this app is selective and biased, supporting some people‚Äôs content and not others who have proven to have great content. I have since stopped using the app as consistently, yet Tiktok bids me to use their paid promotion feature as a gimmick to get more views‚Ä¶ as if 400K followers, who have complained about not seeing my content, wouldn‚Äôt be enough of a follow base to get more than a few thousand views for a video I spent three days producing. Talk about turning your back on the creators who mad this app great. Thanks but not thanks.

review: I think tiktok is a very fun, interesting app but recently i‚Äôve been noticing many problems. This isn‚Äôt my first time experiencing being banned on tiktok, when it first switched to tiktok my crowned account with 58K followers got banned. title: Concerns

review: Ok sooo tiktok definitely is a good app to make time go quicker while waiting for stuff, but it definitely has been getting worse, because they ban small accounts for nothing, but when a major account genuinely goes against the guidelines, they just give them warnings, thats it. And even tho what I said before is going to contradict this, tiktok has gotten much more strict for people who just use tiktok to watch videos. Like they‚Äôre not at all strict with straight white men whatsoever, especially if they‚Äôre ‚Äúattractive‚Äù, but when it comes to any colored person or homosexual or just anyone apart of the lgbtq community, it‚Äôs like they make the guidelines way more strict. And even with people who just watch videos, people aged 16-18 have this stupid ‚Äúage restriction‚Äù that restricts them from watching certain videos. Now I know it‚Äôs a good thing for younger kids, but it‚Äôs completely stupid for those young adults that are 1-2 years away from being 18. Like instead of being strict with us, why don‚Äôt you start working on taking down actually offensive content from bigger creators.
title: Good app, but has multiple issues.

review: I am a novice to TicTok . I became acquainted with the app during the heart of Covid 19 Pandemic . I had heard about tictok . My students and my children are enthralled with technology . Myself and many others in my age group have become accoustime to technology utilized as a tool at work . I never gave much energy to any app other than Facebook . After I became familiar with tiktoc , I became and I still am addicted . My only criticism is a lack of direction for those of us who are not naturally technologically literate . Provide better instructions on the exsisting special aeffects and video tools . I alive that any song you desire is available . I consider this one of a few ‚Äúhappy‚Äù times . my harmless vice of my day . However , many folks on and off TikToc make those us over 50 feel ashamed about experimenting with tic-tok. I love the app . I have so much fun , it forces you to rejuvenate creativity and boldness something many of us gave up on overtime . Thanks For the distraction especially during this HORRIFIC summer of Quarantine ‚ù§Ô∏èüî•
title: Over50TicTok

review: My overall experience has been positive. Odd to say, but I've met some fantastic people through the app. I wasn‚Äôt expecting that but during a time where we had no social contact with others, I felt connected, creative and happy. I would give the app 5 stars, but their reporting processes need improvement. Currently it seems that initial reports must be monitored by bots because unfortunately if someone doesn‚Äôt like you for ANY reason, they can report a video for violating the guidelines- and often it doesn‚Äôt. Numerous false reports like this have allowed homophobia and racist accounts to shut down even wholesome accounts all together because mass reporting, and therefore mass ‚Äúviolations,‚Äù causes an account to be permanently banned - or your views all get halted for months. I would love to see only creator accounts (more than 10k followers) allowed to report and you‚Äôd be identified on who reported, so people had more to lose themselves by reporting and fake troll accounts couldn‚Äôt troll (ie not enough followers)

title: Reasons to get Tik tok

review: This is a really fun app, but it has a lot of problems. One of the biggest is the spam thing that when you try to like a video, it won‚Äôt let you and it says,‚ÄùYou‚Äôre tapping too fast, take a break!‚Äù. It‚Äôs REALLY annoying because I will be liking videos at normal pace, not even spamming, yet it still does that almost every day! Last night it stopped letting me like videos, so I went to bed, woke up, AND IT STILL WOULD NOT LET ME LIKE VIDEOS. After 8 hours! Thus has to be fixed! Another problem is the drafts. When you delete the app it will get rid of app your drafts, and I think that there should be a way to save them. You should also put dates on the drafts, and you should able to search them by sound. Another big thing, please please PLEASE make collections so you can sort your favorite videos, that would be a game changer. You should also have a setting where you can block certain people from seeing your comments on certain videos, cause it can be weird when people you know see your comments. A final thing is that you should be able to search up the people that follow you. You can search your following, so you should be able to search your followers!
title: Ok but a lot of issues

review:
This is a great app, lots potential. However, there‚Äôs no clear reason behind why some users videos get taken down while others with similar content are allowed to stay up. It‚Äôs been rumored that TikTok removes content of POC while others are allowed to post with immunity or contest Under Reviews  with success. When stating reasons why a user feels like their video was removed unfairly, there is no response to them other than, it‚Äôs removed or not. There is no human factor. If it‚Äôs done by automation then what is the REAL reason? I‚Äôve had ppl do tests and it seems that if your lighting is bright, the app allows it to stay. So if you appear fair-skin, you have a better chance of being seen and the video staying up.
Several users are in underwear that happened to be White are allowed over 100K views but POC do the exact same video and will be hit with a violation strike/account ban and vice versa.

We, the TikTok Community, knows that the creators of the app favor ppl like Addison Rae, Chase Hudson, & Charli D‚ÄôAmelio. This is your base. It also proves another point. You know what it is, you know what‚Äôs wrong.

But it‚Äôs just that there are some creators such as flo_silriv that upload amazing content only on tiktok and would like to show the making of of it, the behind the scenes, and stuff like that, to show what happened after they did the video, what they felt or even to tell their followers when they are gonna upload so they can stay tuned. That‚Äôs why I think stories, even if they are overused, would be so helpful for creators specially the ones that are starting to grow on tiktok, 'cause that will make them grow faster and easier.                   Thank you for everything, and hope you consider this idea,                                               Claire, tiktok user.

title: Right invention wrong owners Microsoft this is for you!!!

review:
Dear app developers,

As a social site it is the very simplest of understanding that the idea is to be social. Social media is an idea that people who may have a vast set of differences can find similarities in spite of. Similarities that can bring a smile, start a trend, share an idea, invoke a thought to those we may never have the courage to meet on the street. You are not that site. You have used the ‚Äúidea‚Äù of social media to gain a name for yourselves yet you have never had the intention of being social. You stifle the voices and content of young black creators and now you have censored an entire community and those who seek to support said community. You are flawed. You are an issue. You are a misrepresentation of what social media‚Äôs intention. It is my greatest wish that every minority conducts a mass exit from your app. All that creativity shouldn‚Äôt be culture jacked at your whim. It is my sincere prayer that when that mass exit does happen you‚Äôd be left with an unseasoned mess. In closing, please stop using my little brothers and sisters as advertisement to display some sense of equality that we know you don‚Äôt display. That token negro on the profile pic scheme is played out.
Miracles and blessings! #blm just in case you don‚Äôt get it sense you censored it #Blacklivesmatter
title: You aren‚Äôt doing the world a favor

review:
I love TikTok. It really helps me pass the time, and I think it‚Äôs something unique from other social media apps. However, there are two things I would like to see changed. 
1) My main problem is with phone numbers. We should be able to delete our phone number. I got a new phone number recently, and I wanted to delete my old one and add my new one, but I couldn‚Äôt because TikTok kept saying that I have to verify my old number first (which I can‚Äôt because I don‚Äôt have my old number anymore). I really think that adding an option to just DELETE our phone number would be really helpful, because I‚Äôve seen others having this problem as well. 
2) Another problem is with the number of views. I have a good amount of followers, and I used to get hundreds and even thousands of views, but now I‚Äôm lucky if I even get 100 views. My content has stayed the same, but I just stopped getting on the For You page. I‚Äôve seen other creators (both large and small) having this issue as well. 
Those are my two concerns. Otherwise, it‚Äôs a great app!
title: A good app, but needs some improvements

review: I love tik tok so much and it‚Äôs been getting me through quarantine. It took me awhile to like it due to my strong love for Vine, but now i‚Äôm hooked. However, I have a great suggestion that I think would improve the quality of Tik Tok. Not that it doesn‚Äôt get enough success, but I just think this would create more popularity. I strongly believe that their should be a ‚ÄúRepublish‚Äù button for each Tik Tok created. This way, accounts can republish their all time favorite Tik Toks to their page just like Twitter profiles can ‚ÄúRetweet‚Äù their favorite tweets to their page. The Save button is great for private favorites that you want to go back to or love, and the Like button is great to give some love to a Tik Tok that is entertaining. A Republish button would benefit all types of accounts. Meaning, even if an account doesn‚Äôt make Tik Toks themselves or isn‚Äôt ‚ÄúTik Tok Famous‚Äù, they would still be able to make their account page creative by Republishing their all time favorite Tik Toks!!! This would help the interaction between accounts. Please consider this!!!! It would be fantastic.
title: Tik Tok Tip

review: As a gay, mixed, female (many minorities mixed) I have always had a hard time throughout school and even with social media... I felt like nobody really liked me. I felt almost invisible but I always felt like I was meant to do more. My goal and dream has always been to make as many people smile and have a good day as I can because I know what it‚Äôs like to feel down and out. TikTok has given me such a feeling of euphoria knowing that I‚Äôve done exactly that! Blowing up over night basically and now when I go out people recognize me.. I feel so honored to even be apart of this amazing experience. I was a musically user so TikTok was always up my ally... did I expect to be anywhere near as popular as I am right now? OF COURSE NOT! But I‚Äôm am so thankful that I can make my mark on the world! So again thank you!!! Awesome app 5 stars!! Only problem I ever had was being reported as underage while on livestream, however; a quick appeal and I was back in about 20 hours! I‚Äôd give this app 20 stars if I could - so again thank you for allowing me to make my mark!

review: This app is very addictive and it‚Äôs quite fun. I love the filters and how you can make your account private/public. Although there are some things that I wish for the creator of the app to improve. Number one is not being able to go live under 1000 followers. A lot of people on the app have under 1000 followers and I just think it‚Äôs unfair for some to go live and some not to. Number two is that you have to add your phone number to send messages to people. Most people have made more than one account and once they made a new account they can‚Äôt use their phone number because it was used on their old app that they left/got kicked out of for whatever reason. Number three is there being a limit for likes, follows, and comments. By this I mean how you can‚Äôt like multiple videos if you like to fast. Same thing with following, if you follow to many people at a time you would have to wait an hour which I don‚Äôt get. And how there‚Äôs a character limit on the comments. I understand you wouldn‚Äôt want people writing a whole paragraph, but at least put 1,000 characters for the limit. Other than that this app is pretty good!
title: Its okay

review:
This is probably going to be long, so I apologize for that. 

I understand this app is 13+. There are definitely a lot of kids on this app, but there are also LOTS of adults. So many videos have been taken down because kids do not like videos that adults post. Most of the time, the videos aren‚Äôt even inappropriate. One that was taken down was a girl holding her dog....how is that bad enough to be taken down exactly? It seems like the ones running the app jus take down any video that‚Äôs reported without even looking at it. But I‚Äôve reported videos that ACTUALLY violate terms and they stay up. Why? .
I think a good update would be to add an 18+ update. I don‚Äôt mean make the whole app 18+, i mean to have it so that profiles can set an 18+ setting on their page so it only shows their videos to people who have put their birthday in and say they‚Äôre 18 or over. That way all ages can use the app and kids aren‚Äôt seeing anything inappropriate, and adults can post adult content (no nudity or anything, and without violating terms, obviously. But posts with cursing in it often get taken down). 
Also, shadowbanning needs to stop. So many good creators are losing views because the creators allow them to be shadow banned. Please consider everything I said. Thanks.

review: I personally, love this app! It‚Äôs super entertaining and if I‚Äôm bored it‚Äôs the first thing I go to. The Following page is a great way to watch all the creators I love! But the For You page is even better. It exposes me to creators I might not ever see that I end up loving! And it‚Äôs a great way to find smaller creators. I‚Äôve never had any issues with the app. (I mean obviously it‚Äôs not perfect) The only thing I would say is that rude comments can thrive here. People hating on others is not rare. But the TikTok community is so great, when someone posts a mean comment, that person‚Äôs followers will call them out, and sometime the creator will too. You can find a wide range of content, from body positivity, to mi pan. (if yk yk) Although there are people who try to bring others down on this app, there is an overwhelming amount of creators who‚Äôs content is only to bring others up. title: Racism and Negativity

review: When I graduated from high school in 2012, I moved with my parents from our farm home in Sandy, Oregon, all the way to the Portland, Oregon. From that time up until about 3 months ago, my connection with friends and relatives was through the usual Facebook, insta, text and call, etc... But as the years go on, people come and people go at a rate that‚Äôs manageable. And as I started to near my 26th birthday, I found Tik Tok. At first of course I was reluctant, it seemed as though this was a child‚Äôs thing, and even perhaps I might be frowned upon for using such an app. But as time had gone by, and having seen people older than I as patrons on this platform, I grew  to the notion that maybe...just maybe, I can still act ‚Äòfoolish‚Äô. I can still dance, sing, hell I can even wear nice clothes and show it off. Tik Tok has offered me, interaction, for interactions, meaningful and passive alike, are needed very much in this world today. It‚Äôs akin to the internet being ‚Äòreinvented‚Äô, as it were, for me at least.
title: Interactions in the 21st century, (as seen through the eyes of Emanuel J. Dickinson)

title: Great! Just 1 problem though...

review:
As a social media content creator, I‚Äôd like to say that TikTok is my most preferred platform and avenue to reach out to my audience base of people who love animals. There have been times where I‚Äôve had videos favored with 1.5M overnight, as well as videos that haven‚Äôt reached nearly the amount of followers I‚Äôd hope for. That being said, I still have faith in the fact that even though the algorithm can‚Äôt be manipulated, I still have a faithful audience base that requests me to provide continuing weekly content. I‚Äôm thankful that TikTok has given me the ability to spread a global message through animal entertainment, such as wildlife conservation, pet care tips, Q&A correspondence, and even personal request to assist certain followers in helping them with their exotic and domestic animals. I would like to exclusively use TikTok as my primary-main social media platform, once I begin receiving the volume of likes and follows that I previously had before. Thank you for your time! 

~ Matt ‚ÄúThe Pet Guardian‚Äù

For example, i would apply a transition and visual effect and then when I go to post the following day or sometime later in the week it no longer has it applied. I have to manually go back to effects and re apply them. It‚Äôs odd because it still shows where I want the effects and shows the names but just doesn‚Äôt apply it to the video. I‚Äôve also seen issues with the font reverting back to the default instead of keeping the font I originally chose.
